Class ModeMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raphaellevy.cs1.rockpaperscissors.RPSComponent

  • class ModeMenu
extends ConsoleMenu
    Main menu - displayed at start of game. Allows for choice between 1/1 and 2/3
    Author:
    raffa
